result.name: dynamics-client-relationship-manager
result.notes: NEST Corporation Client Relationship Management system is a database that enables NESTs Communications and Engagement department to efficiently and securely manage the records of potential and existing employers and intermediaries. The system enables creation and maintenance of data for all companies, employers, key stakeholders and associations who have had contact with NEST Corporation through prior Market Engagement activity. The NEST CRM system holds details for; Intermediaries (these may include but are not limited to Financial Advisers, Accountants, Solicitors, Trade Associations) The system also holds details for Employers and other stakeholders such as Unions.  This assists NEST in communicating and delivering key messages regarding auto enrolment and related workplace pensions information relevant to NEST’s proposition. .

organization.name: national-employment-savings-trust
organization.title: National Employment Savings Trust
organization.description:
The National Employment Savings Trust (NEST) Corporation is the trustee of the NEST occupational pension scheme. The scheme, which is run on a not-for-profit basis, ensures that all employers have access to suitable, low-charge pension provision to meet their new duty to enrol all eligible workers into a workplace pension automatically.

NEST Corporation is an executive non-departmental public body of the Department for Work & Pensions

http://www.nestpensions.org.uk/
